name: CrossGunr: Infinite
description:
First and foremost a BIG THANK YOU to 1.) my wife for putting up with all the evenings I decided to code in my spare time..., 2.) Lazy Devs Academy discord, 3.) Shmup Junkie discord and all the awesome people that playtested the Alpha, Beta, and helped me with coding challenges ( I hit the token limit a thousand times ) - I appreciate all of you. For me, I do this because I have such great people who appreciate and challenge me to continue.

Sprites by Helicity Boson - thanks dude!

1.2 Patch - Music Change - Boss Rush Music is now a varied Loop to avoid insanity

1.1 Patch - Bug Fixes (Bigwing not firing after skullwing section, looptimer bugs - leveling up at the wrong time or not at all, added buttons to ingame control text)

-- PREPARE  YOUR CROSSGUN ARMY TO FIGHT THE INFINITE HOARD --

HOLD Z or Button 1 to Fire!

PRESS X or Button 2 to deploy EX if Ready!

HOLD X or Button 2 to deploy EX as SOON as its ready!

You will get MORE CROSSGUNS as you PROGRESS!

REPAIR YOUR SHIP WHEN IN DANGER! Repairs will REAPPEAR if LOST!

-- TIP 1 : CERTAIN ENEMIES WILL CANCEL ALL BULLETS INTO MEDALS --

-- TIP 2: USE EX TO CARVE A PATH TO THE REPAIR --

-- TIP 3: UTILIZE PRACTICE MODES (score will not be saved) --

-- WHAT ARE YOU DOWN HERE READING FOR!! GO GET YOU SOME!!! --
